message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's finish quickly, time is money!
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer, considering the inflation will hurt you more than me. Let's settle this now.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 50/50 split isn't fair with the inflation rates.  How about 55/45?  We should settle before this money loses too much value.
